wikipedia_page.main: Henry Simpson Bennett (3 September 1869 – 18 February 1965) was an English cricketer who was active in 1894. He was born in Pilsley, North East Derbyshire and died in Hyde, Cheshire. He made his first-class debut in 1894 and appeared in one match as an unknown handedness batsman who kept wicket, playing for Lancashire. He scored sixteen runs with a highest score of 11 and held four catches.

response: Henry Bennett or Bennet may refer to:
*Henry Bennett (U.S. politician) (1808–1874), U.S. Representative from New York
*Henry Bennett (rose hybridizer) (1823–1890), British pioneer in the systematic, deliberate hybridisation of roses
*J. Henry Bennett (1876–1956), member of the Wisconsin State Senate
